items.sentence: Concerning this matter, I'm the one to blame.
I don't pretend to understand global warming.
Since my mother was sick, I looked after her.
Could you go to the store and grab some eggs?
I have to hurry. My flight leaves in an hour.
There's a light switch right inside the door.
If we're going to do this, let's do it right.
Just then I heard footsteps in the stairwell.
Do you really want to work for an ex-convict?
Would you tell me your name and phone number?
Your best friend is the money in your pocket.
I don't like sitting next to Tom at concerts.
That's exactly the reaction I was hoping for.
I wish my daughter would dress more modestly.
I need to buy a new set of sheets for my bed.
What do you usually order at this restaurant?
I wasn't aware that somebody was watching me.
I've got too much blood in my alcohol system.
Have you made plans for your summer vacation?
I woke up with a headache again this morning.
